As a Writer for Self-fulfillment, for my vanilla homies that think this ending/hentai is retarded: After witnessing his siblings have sex right in front of him, he knew that winning over his love would not be so easy without any sexual knowledge. Even so, he could not take his time less she fall too harshly. And so, he asks out a girl, then asks his nee-san for advice, while alone, he acts as if they already had sex and pushes her into having sex with him. Doing so again and again, until eventually the little brother is the one to discover them in the act this time. The two brothers compete, but the nee-San can’t choose. The big brothers strength and size, the little brother’s knowledge of her weak spots and enthusiasm. In the end, they choose to live together happily, with the little brother getting over his bratty phase, and the big brother eventually bringing a woman into the family.
